books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A story of wealth, love, and the American Dream in the 1920s.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A powerful story of racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel about totalitarianism, surveillance, and thought control.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel about the turbulent relationship between Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A fantasy adventure about Bilbo Baggins and his quest to reclaim treasure guarded by a dragon.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: A novel about teenage rebellion and alienation.

books.title: Moby Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.description: The story of Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to hunt the white whale.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: An epic fantasy trilogy about the quest to destroy the One Ring.

books.title: Brave New World
books.author: Aldous Huxley
books.description: A dystopian novel about a futuristic society controlled by technology.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: A philosophical novel about a shepherd's journey to find treasure.
